docs.text: Statistics ¶ Statistics ¶ ColumnStat ¶ Histogram ¶ CatalogStatistics ¶ CatalogColumnStat ¶ DataFrameStatFunctions ¶ Statistic functions for DataFrames.(Since: 1.4.0) approxQuantile: Calculates the approximate quantiles of numerical columns of a DataFrame. BloomFilter: Builds a Bloom filter over a specified column corr: Calculates the Pearson Correlation Coefficient of two columns of a DataFrame. countMinSketch: Builds a Count-min Sketch over a specified column. cov: Calculate the sample covariance of two numerical columns of a DataFrame. crosstab: Computes a pair-wise frequency table of the given columns. freqItems: (Scala-specific) Finding frequent items for columns, possibly with false positives. sampleBy: Returns a stratified sample without replacement based on the fraction given on each stratum. Reference ¶
docs.title: Statistics
